item.title: what is diffence between comparator and compatable in JAVA
item.description: Comparable Comparator java.lang package. java.util package. Sorting interface that designed for a condition interface that designed for mutiple conditions Comparable affects the original class Comparator doesn’t affect the original class compareTo() method with 1 parameter compare() method with 2 parameters Collections.sort(List) Collections.sort(List, Comparator) Arrays.sort(array) Arrays.sort(array, myComparator); Definition Both interfaces are very similer because they are for sorting lists and arrays.
